languages.text: This weapon inflicts a special immolation effect that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Это оружие накладывает особый эффект "испепеление": цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (8) и не может снять эффект до конца боя. Также цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +5 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each hit inflicts two stacks of the melting effect. Melting : Flesh and armour of the creature melt, reducing its Deflection by −1 and Armour by −10 for each stack. Laser weapons are effective against targets in cover and targets with high dodge.

This weapon inflicts a special immolation effect that inflicts burning (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. The target also must pass a Toughness resistance test with a +5 bonus or become stunned for 1 round.

This weapon inflicts a special immolation effect that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Это оружие накладывает особый эффект "испепеление": цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (8) и не может снять эффект до конца боя. Также цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +5 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon inflicts a special immolation effect that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Это оружие накладывает особый эффект "испепеление": цель получает горение (8) и не может снять эффект до конца боя. Также цель выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление с бонусом +5 и в случае провала оказывается оглушена на 1 раунд.

Это оружие накладывает особый эффект "испепеление": цель получает горение (8) и не может снять эффект до конца боя. Также цель выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление с бонусом +5 и в случае провала оказывается оглушена на 1 раунд.

languages.text: 这把武器会造成特殊的“燔祭”效果，可以让被影响的角色获得{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（8）效果，且此效果在战斗结束之前无法移除。除此之外，施加“燔祭”效果时，目标还需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}韧性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，否则会被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: This weapon inflicts a special immolation effect that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每次{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人，都会施加2层{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}熔化{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。 熔化：熔化目标生物的血肉与{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}，每层效果使目标{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低1点，护甲降低10点。 激光武器很适合对付藏在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面的敌人，以及{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}较高的灵活敌人。

languages.text: この武器は特別な焼身効果を持ち、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}​炎上{/g}(8)を与えて、戦闘終了まで解除できない。また、ターゲットは+5の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}がある{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: This weapon inflicts a special immolation effect that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}するごとに{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}溶解{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}のスタック＋2を獲得する。 溶解：生物の肉体と{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が溶け、スタックごとに{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}が1、アーマーが10減少する。 レーザー武器は{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}の後ろにいるターゲットおよび{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}能力の高いターゲットに対して効果的である。

languages.text: Esta arma inflige una inmolación especial que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (8) y no se puede quitar hasta el final del combate. Además, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon inflicts a special immolation effect that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} inflige +2 acumulaciones del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}derretimiento{/g}. Derretimiento: la carne y {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} de la criatura se derriten, reduciendo su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} en −1 y su armadura en −10 por cada acumulación. Las armas láser son efectivas contra los objetivos tras {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} y con alta {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Waffe verursacht einen speziellen Selbstverbrennungseffekt, der {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (8) zufügt, jedoch bis zum Ende des Kampfes nicht entfernt werden kann. Das Ziel muss außerdem eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 bestehen, oder aber wird 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon inflicts a special immolation effect that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} verursacht +2 Mal den aufaddierbaren {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Schmelzen{/g}. Schmelzen: Das Fleisch und die {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} der Kreatur schmelzen und reduzieren ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} um -1 und ihre Rüstung um -10 pro aufaddiertem Effekt. Laserwaffen sind wirksam gegen Ziele in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} und Ziele mit hohem {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}.

languages.text: Cette arme applique un effet spécial d'immolation qui inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (8), mais qui ne peut être dissipé jusqu'à la fin du combat. La cible doit également réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +5, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon inflicts a special immolation effect that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} inflige +2 cumuls de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Fusion{/g}. Fusion : la chair et l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de la créature fondent, ce qui réduit sa {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de -1 et son armure de -10 par cumul. Les armes laser sont efficaces contre les cibles à {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvert{/g} et les cibles dotées d'un niveau d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} élevé.
